name: Airfield Mania
overview: Are you the right person to guide aircrafts to their runway? Now you can prove it with "Airfield Mania"! Airfield Mania is an addictive line-draw air traffic control game. But don´t tell us we didn´t warn you. It´s really addictive. It features: ✔ 3 Maps! ✔ Easy to learn hard to master! Instructions: Touch the aircrafts and drag them to their runways (with the right color) and avoid collisions.
